title: Kyoto protocol poster II
content:
Hello Again,

Here is the second poster for the Kyoto protocol series that I'm doing for my blog ( [http://whatype.wordpress.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824222956/http:/whatype.wordpress.com/ "http://whatype.wordpress.com/") ). This one shows the percentage of emissions that every country has signed to achieve by 2012.

Once again I would really appreciate every input you could give me on this.

Thank you so much in advance

Pedro Monteiro  
 [http://whatype.wordpress.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824222956/http:/whatype.wordpress.com/ "http://whatype.wordpress.com/")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824222956im_/http:/typophile.com/files/kyoto3b_6230.jpg)
author: whatype

comments.content:
The spacing looks a little crammed right here:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824222956im_/http:/typophile.com/files/here_5854.gif)
  
I know i pointed out only one, but each instance that is similar to this one. Still, its not a very large thumbnail.

Also, the alignment and spacing in the lower right corner.

It looks good tho!

[evan](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824222956/http:/evanmade.com/)
You are right I DO have to take care of that (have all the circles go up a little) :-D
